item.title: Version 1.2.4
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add automatic GitHub Release creation to build script

Added ENABLEGITHUBRELEASE option to build_release.sh for automated

release workflow. This feature streamlines the release process by

automatically creating GitHub releases with assets when building.

Key changes:

  • New ENABLEGITHUBRELEASE environment variable (default: false)
  • Auto-enables when ENABLE_NOTARIZE=true (full release mode)
  • Validates gh CLI installation and authentication
  • Creates GitHub release with version tag (v{version})
  • Uploads XKey.dmg and signature.txt automatically
  • Supports custom release notes via .release_notes.md
  • Auto-generates notes from latest commit if no custom file
  • Triggers GitHub Actions for appcast generation

Version bump: 1.2.3 → 1.2.4

Usage:

ENABLEGITHUBRELEASE=true ./build_release.sh

# Or auto-enabled with notarization:

ENABLENOTARIZE=true ./buildrelease.sh

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
